reviews.review: my new favourite game, somehow has an even better story than the original and great twist villian.
Fun game, some parts like portals made my brain hurt.

Portal 2, one of the most satisfying and fun sequels to ever sequel. Doom II, The Empire Strikes Back, Terminator 2. The sequel that takes the original and improves upon it in nearly every way. If you like puzzles, buy it. If you like Portal, definitely buy it.

It's been ten years since Portal 2 was released, and it's an undeniable classic. It was the game that got me into Steam in the first place!  The physics in this game are a work of art, I'm always so impressed with how seamlessly you can pass through the portals. Not to mention the hilarious comedy. I wish I could play Co-Op.
